high_descs: Turn right, go the the wall then left and go to the desk
Pick up the pencil behind the pen on the desk
Turn around and to your right. Go to the window between the desk and bed.
Put the pencil on top of the basket beside the desk
anns.task_desc: Put the pencil on the basket next to desk.

high_descs: Turn right, walk across room, turn left, go to desk.
Pick up pencil closest to the wall.
Turn right, go to bed, turn right, go to window, turn right.
Turn on lamp on desk to the left of the blue book.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a pencil and turn on a lamp.

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the wall. Turn left and walk up to the desk.
Pick up the pencil on the desk
Turn around to face the bed. Walk straight to the bed and turn right. Walk to the window and turn right to face the desk.
Turn on the lamp while facing the desk.
anns.task_desc: To take the pencil off the desk and turn on the lamp.
